item.title: A Powerball player in Arkansas has won a $1.817 billion lottery jackpot
item.description: A Powerball player in Arkansas has won a $1.817 billion jackpot Wednesday amid the Christmas holiday

item.title: Storm system threatens more rainfall Christmas Day over waterlogged Southern California
item.description: Rain from a powerful winter storm that swept across Southern California has begun to taper off

item.title: Southern California drivers urged to reconsider Christmas travel amid storm
item.description: Heavy rain and gusty winds from a powerful winter storm system are bringing flash floods and mudslides to parts of Southern California

item.title: Grand jury declines to indict man in shooting that killed teen at Kentucky State University
item.description: A grand jury has declined to indict a father of two Kentucky State University students who was charged with murder in an on-campus shooting that kille...

item.title: ICE agents shoot at a moving vehicle on Christmas Eve, injuring 2
item.description: County police in Maryland say federal immigration agents shot at a moving vehicle on Christmas Eve during an enforcement and removal action
